WorkItem.Description:
Not exactly sure what the problem is, but if you compare the two attached character files, Rawr.DPSK seems to be under-valuing 4pcT8?
 
The first file, "UnholyOB3 2009-8-23 20-53" shows 5725  dps  (4pcT8)
The second file, "UnholyOB3 2009-8-27 22-20" shows 5748 dps  (no 4pcT8)
 
Another sim I run disagrees with Rawr, and my gut feeling is something is wrong.
(Yes I realise I'm using the alliance version of shoulders btw lol)

Comments.Message:
Rawr is valuing the 4T8 bonus as around 80 DPS; the implementation of the 4pc bonus has been pretty thoroughly picked over, and I'm confident that it is currently correct. It looks like the non-set pieces are providing a substantial enough improvement in DPS relative to the set pieces that the value of the 4pc bonus is being overtaken.
Also, your characters are both saved with an outdated boss armor value; the correct value is 10643 armor.
